summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block Thirty-four (34) of Pontius Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between Melrose Avenue North and Bellevue Avenue North, and from East Thomas Street to East Harrison Street, by grading the same on a uniform straight grade between the grade as at present established on East Harrison Street and East Thomas Street, all in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 34462; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
